body: Some packages (e.g. perl) depend on the gdbm package, which is often but not always provided by the operating system. Even if the OS packages are installed, they may be outdated or buggy, and the header files may need to be installed separately. For example, I needed to install my own gdbm to work around a bug when building perl on SuSE Enterprise Linux 11.3.
title: gdbm: GNU dbm package for manipulating hashed databases
